## Project Proposal - Data

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r data}
# Data
co2_emmisions <- read_csv(here::here("co2_pcap_cons.csv"))
life_expectancy <- read_csv(here::here("lex.csv"))

# Data cleaning


# Pivoting Longer
co2_emmisions_long <- co2_emmisions |>
  mutate(across(`1800`:`2022`, ~ as.numeric(.x))) |>
  pivot_longer(cols = `1800`:`2022`,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "co2")

life_exp_long <- life_expectancy |>
  mutate(across(`1800`:`2100`, ~ as.numeric(.x))) |>
  pivot_longer(cols = `1800`:`2100`,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "life_exp")

```
